Package it.unipr.sowide.abcde.model

Class Manager<E extends Entity>

java.lang.Object
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.actor.Behavior
it.unipr.sowide.abcde.model.Manager<E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PersonManager
public abstract class Manager<E extends Entity>
extends Behavior
The Manager abstract class provides a partial implementation of a behavior that manages the simulation of the entities of the local partition unit.
See Also:
Serialized Form
